attributes.action: maintain the present position on the development of Green Belt Land and that a change of use planning application for designated agricultural land must take full account of all current conditions and restrictions. Also that advice in the document entitled ODPM Circular 01/06 ‘Planning for Gypsy and Traveller Caravan Sites’ (Circular 1/06) be disallowed in current decisions and re-evaluated with a full public consultation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
